oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Broadside creating the N.B. Forrest Camp of the Confederate Veterans
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Framed broadside with the mast head of the R.E. Lee Camp, No. 1, Confederate Veterans which establishes the creation of the N. B. Forrest Camp, No. 3 of the Confederate Veterans. The item is dated September 1, 1885 and the camp was established in Chattanooga, Tennessee. The broadside also lists the founding members of the camp. The item was purchased on Missionary Ridge from a descendant of one of the members.
